content: File lifetime disabled in the room

comment.text: This translation key is used for "File lifetime disabled in the room", a message that typically appears when a user tries to upload or download files from a room where file sharing has been disabled. It is likely displayed on a button or form control, indicating the reason for the action being restricted.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تم تعطيل صلاحية الملف في الغرفة' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'File lifetime disabled in the room'. While it conveys the general meaning, it's a bit verbose and the phrasing 'صلاحية الملف' (the file's validity/permission) isn't the most appropriate. A more accurate and concise translation would focus on the 'lifetime' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: مدة صلاحية الملف معطلة في الغرفة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an error, the Arabic translation uses a passive voice which may not be the preferred style. Consider active voice for better clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تعطيل مدة صلاحية الملف في الغرفة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Faylın istifadə müddəti otaqda deaktiv edilib" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. 'File lifetime disabled' is better conveyed as something like 'Faylın ömrü otaqda söndürülüb' or 'Otaqda fayl ömrü söndürülüb'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otaqda fayl ömrü söndürülüb

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and not idiomatic Bulgarian. 'Продължителността на живота на файла е деактивирана в стаята' sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'file lifetime disabled'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файловете не изтичат в стаята

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'живота' (life) is not the best choice here. It refers to the period of existence, but 'изтичане' (expiration) is more appropriate for files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файловете не изтичат в стаята

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Životnost souboru v místnosti zakázána' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural and overly formal in Czech. A more natural phrasing would imply disabling a feature rather than the file's lifespan.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like 'Omezení životnosti souborů v místnosti' or 'Životnost souborů v místnosti není povolena' depending on the precise meaning intended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dateilebensdauer im Raum deaktiviert' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in German. 'Dateilebensdauer' is not the most common or idiomatic way to refer to file lifetime. It's overly technical for a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more user-friendly phrasing such as 'Dateispeicherzeit im Raum deaktiviert' or 'Dateispeicher im Raum deaktiviert' or even 'Dateilagerung im Raum deaktiviert'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Greek. "Έγινε απενεργοποίηση διάρκειας ζωής αρχείων στο δωμάτιο" sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'file lifetime disabled'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Απενεργοποίηση διάρκειας ζωής αρχείων στο δωμάτιο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The passive voice ('Έγινε απενεργοποίηση...') while grammatically correct, can be less concise and clear in UI elements. A more active voice might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διακοπή διάρκειας ζωής αρχείων στο δωμάτιο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vida útil de los archivos en la sala desactivada' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'File lifetime disabled in the room'.  'Desactivada' implies the room itself is disabled, not the file lifetime feature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Archivo: vida útil desactivada en la sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a colon which might not be necessary or desired. It's better to keep it concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vida útil de archivos desactivada en la sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tiedoston ikä on poistettu käytöstä tässä huoneessa' is too literal and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'File lifetime disabled'. A more natural Finnish phrasing would convey the intent more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like 'Huoneessa tiedostojen elinikä on poistettu käytöstä' or 'Tiedostojen elinikä ei ole käytössä tässä huoneessa'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Durée de vie du dossier désactivée dans la salle' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in French. 'Dossier' refers to a folder, not a file. A more natural translation would use a term related to file storage or retention.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Durée de vie des fichiers désactivée dans la salle

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ֆայլի ժամկետն անջատված է սենյակում" is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning clearly. " ժամկետն անջատված է" can be interpreted as the 'deadline is disabled', instead of 'file lifetime is disabled'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Սենյակում ֆայլերի կյանսաժամկետը աշխատանքից դուրս է եղել" or "Սենյակում ֆայլերի ժամկետը չի գործում".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ルームでファイルの有効期限は無効です' is too literal and sounds unnatural in Japanese. It directly translates 'File lifetime disabled in the room'. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of the file being permanently available or not expiring.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルーム内のファイルは有効期限切れになりません

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ຕະຫຼອດຊີວິດຂອງໄຟລ໌ທີ່ຖືກປິດໃຊ້ງານຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງ' is overly literal and doesn't convey the meaning of 'File lifetime disabled'. A more natural and accurate translation would be something along the lines of 'ການປິດໃຊ້ງານໄລຍະເວລາຂອງໄຟລ໌ໃນຫ້ອງ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການປິດໃຊ້ງານໄລຍະເວລາຂອງໄຟລ໌ໃນຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The current phrasing 'ຕະຫຼອດຊີວິດຂອງໄຟລ໌ທີ່ຖືກປິດໃຊ້ງານ' is a bit clunky. While grammatically correct, it's not the most fluid way to express the concept.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໄລຍະເວລາຂອງໄຟລ໌ຖືກປິດໃຊ້ງານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Faila darbmūžs telpā ir atspējots' is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Faila glabāšanas laiks telpā ir atspējots' or 'Telpas failu glabāšanas laiks ir atspējots'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Telpas failu glabāšanas laiks ir atspējots

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Bestand levensduur uitgeschakeld in de kamer' is technically correct but sounds awkward and less natural in Dutch. 'Bestand' (file) isn't the most common term in this context. A more natural phrasing would convey that the lifetime functionality itself is disabled.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bestandslifetime uitgeschakeld in de kamer

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Okres ważności plików jest wyłączony w tym pokoju" is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Polish. While technically correct, it's not the most idiomatic way to express the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyłączono okres ważności plików w tym pokoju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'okres ważności plików' can be simplified.  It's more natural to use a more concise wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyłączone są automatyczne usuwania plików w tym pokoju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Tempo de vida do arquivo desativado na sala" is not the most natural or accurate rendering of "File lifetime disabled in the room". While understandable, it's a bit literal. A more fluent translation might emphasize the disabling action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Arquivo com tempo de vida desabilitado na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tempo de vida do arquivo desativado na sala' is not the most natural or precise translation of 'File lifetime disabled in the room'. While understandable, it's a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would better convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Arquivo com tempo de vida desabilitado na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Durata de viață a fișierelor este dezactivată pentru această sală" is a bit literal and verbose. A more natural and concise translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fișierele nu au durată de viață în această sală.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'В комнате отключен срок действия файла' is a literal translation, but it doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally in Russian. 'Lifetime disabled' implies a setting or feature that's been turned off, not that the file itself has an expiration date that's been deactivated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like 'Отключена функция ограничения срока действия файлов в комнате' or 'Ограничение срока действия файлов в комнате отключено'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'රූම් තුළ ගොනු වල කාලය ක්‍රියාත්මක නැත.' while understandable, doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'File lifetime disabled in the room'.  It's a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would better convey that the file lifetime feature is turned off, rather than the time itself being absent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like: 'රූම් තුළ ගොනු වල කාලසීමාව අක්‍රියයි.' or 'රූම් තුළ ගොනු වල කාලසීමා ක්‍රියාත්මකව නොමැත.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Doba používania súborov v miestnosti je vypnutá' is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning as clearly as it could. 'Lifetime disabled' implies a feature is turned off, not a duration being turned off.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Použitie životnosti súborov je vypnuté

ai_spell_check_issues.description: A more natural and concise translation would be to convey the 'disabled' aspect more directly.  The current translation is somewhat verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vypnuté použitie životnosti súborov

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Življenjska doba datoteke je v sobi onemogočena" is overly literal and slightly awkward. A more natural Slovenian phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Datoteke v sobi nimajo časovne omejitve

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Време трајања фајлова у соби је онемогућено" is a literal translation and slightly awkward. A more natural and concise phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Филe трајања је онемогућено у соби

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. "Vreme trajanja fajlova u sobi je onemogućeno" is correct grammatically but sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "Isključeno vreme trajanja fajlova u sobi" or "Fajlovi u sobi nemaju rok trajanja".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fajlovi u sobi nemaju rok trajanja

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Odada dosya yaşam süresi devre dışı bırakıldı' is too literal and sounds unnatural in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Odada dosya ömrü devre dışı bırakıldı' or 'Odada dosya ömrü kapandı'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odada dosya ömrü devre dışı bırakıldı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "У кімнаті вимкнено період існування файлів" is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally as possible in Ukrainian. "Period існування" sounds quite formal and technical. A more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: У кімнаті деактивовано обмеження терміну життя файлів

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã tắt thời gian tồn tại của tập tin trong phòng' is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tắt tính năng thời gian tồn tại tập tin trong phòng

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'thời gian tồn tại của tập tin' (lifetime of the file) is a bit clunky.  A simpler wording is preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: thời gian lưu trữ tập tin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "房间内文件有效期已禁用" is a bit too formal and lengthy for the English "File lifetime disabled in the room." A more natural and concise translation would improve the user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 房间文件有效期禁用
